mapper.select: /* ReceiptMap.selectReceiptDetail */ SELECT A.INVT_NM , A.APLCT_NO , A.APLCT_DT , A.APLCT_NM , A.MEMO ,( case when (A.STATUS = '1') then '결제대기' when (A.STATUS = '2') then '결제완료' when (A.STATUS = '3') then '접수완료' else '납품완료' end)STATUS , A.USER_ID , A.FB_TYPE , B.ORDER_CD , B.USER_ID , B.APLCT_NO , B.PRICE , B.ORDER_STAT , B.ORDER_DT , B.PAY_METHOD , B.ACCOUNT_NO , B.DISCNT_RS FROM RV_APPLY_TB A LEFT JOIN RV_PAY_TB B ON A.USER_ID=B.USER_ID AND A.APLCT_NO=B.APLCT_NO WHERE A.APLCT_NO = #{aplct_no} AND A.USER_ID = #{user_id}
